title: Utility Tariffs: We Are Paying For A "Bad Gov't"... - Hon. Kyeremateng Agyarko
text: Member of Parliament for Ayawaso West Wuogon, Emmanuel Kyeremateng Agyarko has attributed the call by utility providers for an upward adjustment in utility tariffs to the "inefficiency and mismanagement" of President John Mahama and his
